mapper.select: SELECT d.DINING_ID, d.DINING_NAME, d.TYPE, d.LOCATION, d.PHONE_NUMBER, d.MANAGER_NAME, d.DINING_OPERATION_HOURS, d.DINING_CLASSIFICATION, d.DINING_RESV_AVAILABILITY, d.DINING_INTRODUCTION, d.DINING_DETAILINFO, (SELECT IMAGE_URL FROM DINING_IMAGE WHERE DINING_ID = d.DINING_ID AND IMAGE_TYPE = 'MAIN' AND ROWNUM = 1) AS DINING_MAIN_IMAGE, (SELECT IMAGE_URL FROM DINING_IMAGE WHERE DINING_ID = d.DINING_ID AND IMAGE_TYPE = 'LOGO' AND ROWNUM = 1) AS DINING_LOGO_IMAGE FROM DINING d WHERE d.DINING_ID = #{diningId}
SELECT IMAGE_URL FROM DINING_IMAGE WHERE DINING_ID = #{diningId} AND IMAGE_TYPE = 'CAROUSEL' ORDER BY DISPLAY_ORDER
mapper.update: UPDATE DINING SET DINING_NAME = #{dining_name}, TYPE = #{type}, LOCATION = #{location}, PHONE_NUMBER = #{phone_number}, MANAGER_NAME = #{manager_name}, DINING_INTRODUCTION = #{dining_introduction}, DINING_DETAILINFO = #{dining_detailinfo}, DINING_OPERATION_HOURS = #{dining_operation_hours}, DINING_RESV_AVAILABILITY = #{dining_resv_availability}, DINING_CLASSIFICATION = #{dining_classification} WHERE DINING_ID = #{dining_id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM DINING_IMAGE WHERE DINING_ID = #{diningId} AND IMAGE_TYPE = #{imageType}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DINING_IMAGE (IMAGE_ID, DINING_ID, IMAGE_TYPE, IMAGE_URL, DISPLAY_ORDER, REG_DATE) VALUES (DINING_IMAGE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{diningId}, #{imageType}, #{imageUrl}, #{displayOrder}, SYSDATE)
